Title: Relates to the rate of interest to be paid on judgments and accrued claims
Summary: Relates to the rate of interest to be paid on judgments and accrued claims; ties the rate of interest to the maturity treasury yield as published by the federal reserve.
LawCode: Add ยง7-a, Bank L; amd ยง5004, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to the rate of interest to be paid upon judgments and accrued claims
